body:
README for Nutcracker

Nutcracker is a web based, php tool that will create animations for RGB devices. Nutcracker allows for the easy generation of complicated effects on a Christmas RGB Mega-Tree.

The Nutcracker currently supports output for 4 different sequencers: Light Show Pro, Lighy-O-Rama, Vixen and HLS.

![sample effect from Nutcracker](http://meighan.net/nutcracker/effects/workspaces/2/A+FLY_GITHUB.gif)
tagline: RGB Effects builder for Chistmas Animations
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Nutcracker
